channel.title: What if there was a way to add more then 20 instruments to your projects!
channel.description: Hey how’s it going? I was using auxy and thinking gosh I wish I could add more instruments to my project. And then it hit me why not limit the amount of loops you can put in a scene ![image|161x298](upload://eZO3iCJUqEWvBuPAXTo0Mi487MY.jpeg) but not limit the amount of instruments u can put in your projects. ![image|281x500](upload://pDYKqsOXyzPtUlhLaJFhjXgs6Z3.jpeg) That shouldn’t affect the cpu usage opposed to being able to use every instrument in each section.

item.title: What if there was a way to add more then 20 instruments to your projects!
item.dc:creator: JacobJustus
item.description:
iPods have lower cpu usage then phones so I was suggesting that my iPod crashes as well if not more, not that you had an iPod touch. Lol no one has an iPod touch these days.

Read full topic

item.title: What if there was a way to add more then 20 instruments to your projects!
item.dc:creator: AzureOnyx
item.description:
Simply put, older devices can’t handle 20 instruments at the same time, especially if the automation is heavy. I’ve had that problem in Auxy 4 when all 16 slots were filled and the automation was heavy. Wasn’t a pleasant experience.

Read full topic
item.source: What if there was a way to add more then 20 instruments to your projects!

item.title: What if there was a way to add more then 20 instruments to your projects!
item.dc:creator: JacobJustus
item.description:
Yeah I get what you mean although for me I feel is to much of a limiter and doesn’t let me bring my projects to it’s full potential. I’ve actually added more instruments through combining two projects.

Read full topic

item.title: What if there was a way to add more then 20 instruments to your projects!
item.dc:creator: Jax
item.description:
I feel like the limit helps me keep my songs simple and not over complicated, and with the new addition of the drum kit slots, I don’t really have a need for more instruments. I don’t know, just my opinion!

Read full topic
item.source: What if there was a way to add more then 20 instruments to your projects!

item.title: What if there was a way to add more then 20 instruments to your projects!
item.dc:creator: JacobJustus
item.description:
Do you know the part where u can divi up your song into different sections?

They should limit how many instruments u can place in those but not limit how many I struments u can add to the song.

Read full topic

item.title: What if there was a way to add more then 20 instruments to your projects!
item.dc:creator: JacobJustus
item.description:
Hey how’s it going? I was using auxy and thinking gosh I wish I could add more instruments to my project. And then it hit me why not limit the amount of loops you can put in a scene
but not limit the amount of instruments u can put in your projects.

That shouldn’t affect the cpu usage opposed to being able to use every instrument in each section.

Read full topic
item.source: What if there was a way to add more then 20 instruments to your projects!
